lines.text: [after Rusty hits the cop over the head with a desk lamp]
What the hell did you do that for?
So everytime you're scared you hit a guy over the head with a desk lamp?
And that's why you should never trust a black man named Chip!
Your daddy didn't say, "If you work for Ms. Crock, you'll get ahead." He said if you work for Ms. Crock, you'll get head!
Sweet Jesus! We kidnapped a turd!
But I have to go to the stadium!
You ain't Got to do nothing Till I Tell You, You Smelly Old Bitch!

[after finding out the Germans are pulling out and also finding out the realization of not paying the ransom]
Fuuuuuuccccccckkkkkk!
You expect me to believe you were mugged?
Mugged? It was more like a rape!
